title: Mobile Mathematics Microlearning Program for 21st-Century Learning Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Implementation of a task-based learning environment utilizing smartphones in limited-technology settings.

learning_goals: Enhance the applicability of the mathematical modeling process to over 80% of learners for solving real-life problems.
Ensure learners exchange peer feedback at least three times during virtual team activities using collaboration tools.
Practice analyzing data collected in mobile environments and making decisions at least four times.
Develop at least two innovative mathematical problem-solving strategies per learner to foster self-directed learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
